ygData.subject: Re: Level 61
ygData.msgSnippet: An interesting side note, i belive Verant made it this way to not let you hev it HOWEVER, the expansion will supposedly raise the level cap to 75... so perhaps
ygData.messageBody:
An interesting side note, i belive Verant made it this way to not let
you hev it HOWEVER, the expansion will supposedly raise the level cap to
75... so perhaps these will be usable then? I wonder what they will
do...

- Sythe, CazicThule

Steven Zaharakis wrote:
>
> From: Steven Zaharakis <sz200@...>
>
>
> I think thats just Verants way of not letting you have the spell at all,
> making it set to a level that is unreachable. I don't think spellcasters
> will ever get to learn spells from every other school. What would be the
> point of classes then?
>
> Zolthar
>
> At 03:24 AM 5/22/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "Nick Burnett" <nburnett@...>
> >
> >I attempted to scribe the spell 'Enchant Silver' as a Wizard, and I got the
> >message "You must be level 61 to scribe this spell."
> >
> >I am conjecturing that with the expansion and levels above 50, spellcasters
> >will be able to learn spells from other schools. Just an interesting
> >theory, considering the game seems to think I could learn an Enchanter spell
> >as a Wizard provided I am level 61 :)
> >
> >
